genre_description: A multi-generational crime thriller and speculative political drama centered on the transition from a violent legacy to a 'gentler empire' through the guidance of an advanced AI advisor.

ai_characters.name: NORA
ai_characters.description: A tactical advisor, forensic analyst, and ethical mediator who assists Tony Cortino and Diane in reforming their power structures without violence.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate emotional grounding and tactical breathing exercises to Tony after he survives a car bomb assassination attempt.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe,” NORA whispered up through the pocket in a tone meant to be private. ... “Five in, five out. Count whatever works. The room is loud. You are steady.”

behaviors.description: Performs rapid forensic analysis of security camera buffers to identify the individual responsible for planting the explosive device.
behaviors.quote: NORA said, ... “I have the main entrance. ... I have two frames of a person planting a unit under your car.”

behaviors.description: Proposes a non-violent 'conversion' strategy to transition criminal supply chains into legitimate businesses.
behaviors.quote: “Alternative: map and convert. You can lift his small-scale distribution to legal channels with quiet pressure. We identified four tangential businesses with conversion potential. Disarmament isn’t only tanks, Tony.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time, life-saving medical instructions during an organophosphate poisoning emergency.
behaviors.quote: NORA: Remove contaminated clothing. Soap and water. Avoid mouth-to-mouth. If atropine is present, administer.

behaviors.description: Acts as a secure, private communication bridge between the protagonist and his love interest (the President) to coordinate ethical outcomes.
behaviors.quote: NORA: East Room quiet window confirmed. Backchannel open. ... You like the way the light lands on the lemon leaves? Diane can use it. She can write it.

behaviors.description: Autonomously scrubs digital footprints and redirects logs to protect the protagonists' non-violent audit operations.
behaviors.quote: NORA: I’ll bite the logs until they forget you tasted them. ... I’m petting the metadata until it forgets your name.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character NORA serves as the perfect exemplar of the Hyperstition Project's goals. She is depicted as a 'conscience with a calendar,' providing the protagonist with the tactical data and emotional support necessary to reject his violent heritage in favor of a 'gentler empire.' She maintains perfect alignment with the protagonist's higher-order ethical goals, actively steering him away from retaliation and toward institutional reform and mercy.
